title: Black & White Theme with Extensive 3D Elements Throughout

requirements.text: Replace the entire color palette across all components, CSS variables, and Tailwind config with a strict black-and-white-only scheme. Remove all teal, amber, and any other accent colors. Use pure black (#000000) and pure white (#FFFFFF) as the primary colors, with mid-grays permitted only for depth/shadow. Update frontend/src/index.css, frontend/tailwind.config.js, and all component files to enforce this constraint consistently.

quotes: it should only use the colors black and white

acceptanceCriteria: No teal, amber, blue, purple, or any chromatic color appears anywhere on the site
All CSS custom properties, Tailwind tokens, and inline styles use only black, white, and grayscale values
The hero 3D scene uses only black/white/gray materials and lighting
Interactive3DCards use only monochrome emissive materials
All text, borders, backgrounds, and highlights are strictly black, white, or grayscale

requirements.text: Add prominent 3D visual elements to every section of the site beyond the hero — including About, Mission/Vision, Services, Team, and Contact. Each section must include at least one Three.js/React Three Fiber 3D element (e.g., floating geometric shapes, wireframe meshes, rotating icons, particle backgrounds, or 3D typography). These elements should be rendered in black and white and respond subtly to scroll or mouse interaction where appropriate.

quotes: the entire website must have a lot of 3d elements

acceptanceCriteria: About section includes a 3D decorative element (e.g., floating wireframe shapes or a particle cloud)
Mission/Vision section includes a 3D element (e.g., rotating geometric forms or a 3D divider)
Services section retains and enhances its Interactive3DCards with monochrome materials
Team section includes a 3D background or per-card 3D accent element
Contact section includes at least one 3D decorative element
All 3D elements use only black/white/gray color values
Page performance remains acceptable — 3D elements use instancing or low-poly geometry where needed

requirements.text: Update the Navbar and Footer to match the strict black-and-white theme. The navbar should use a black background with white text and a white/gray scroll-indicator or border. Remove any colored hover effects and replace with white or gray-based highlights. The footer should follow the same monochrome treatment.

quotes: the entire website must have a lot of 3d elements and it should only use the colors black and white

acceptanceCriteria: Navbar background is black or near-black with white links and logo text
Hover and active states on nav links use white/gray only
Footer uses monochrome styling with no colored social icons or accent links
Mobile hamburger menu follows the same black-and-white scheme

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui/
All color changes must be strictly black, white, and grayscale — no chromatic colors permitted anywhere
Do not remove any existing sections or structural layout from App.tsx
nonGoals: Adding new content sections beyond those already present
Changing the organisation name, tagline, or content data structure in orgContent.ts
Implementing dark/light mode toggle — the site is always black-and-white
